titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives during Teacher Appreciation Week regarding the importance of education, particularly civics education.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives during Teacher Appreciation Week regarding the importance of education, particularly civics education.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that to continue to cherish our rights and duties, all Americans should recognize the importance of civics education.
